byline.contributor: Adam Goldman and Marc Santora contributed reporting.

keywords.value: Jewish Community Center Assn of North America
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The threats, which proved unfounded, targeted as many as 16 schools and community centers, raising little doubt that the phone calls had been orchestrated.
snippet: The threats, which proved unfounded, targeted as many as 16 schools and community centers, raising little doubt that the phone calls had been orchestrated....

headline.main: Anonymous Bomb Threats Rattle Jewish Centers Across Eastern U.S.
headline.print_headline: Anonymous Bomb Threats Rattle U.S. Jewish Centers
